drug.name: Bumadizone
drug.description: Bumadizone has been approved for use in Germany and Austria, it is a drug with anti-inflammatory, antipyretic, and analgesic properties, and was marketed for the treatment of both rheumatoid arthritis and gout [L5650]. Its use is restricted to these conditions, due to risks this drug poses [L5650].

link.title: WHO - Consolidated list of products whoes consumption has been banned or withdrawn

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as anilides. These are organic heterocyclic compounds derived from oxoacids RkE(=O)l(OH)m (l not 0) by replacing an OH group by the NHPh group or derivative formed by ring substitution.
